survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Electric Vehicle (EV) Home Charging Station Installation Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate customer satisfaction with the installation process, functionality, and support services of home EV charging stations.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall installation process of your EV home charging station?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for ease of analysis. Ensure the question is mobile-responsive.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall installation process of your EV home charging station?

questions.question_text: Which of the following issues, if any, did you encounter during the installation? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Include an option for no issues encountered.

script.question_text: Which of the following issues, if any, did you encounter during the installation? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How would you rate the professionalism of the installation team?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point scale for consistency. Consider adding a 'Not applicable' option if needed.

script.question_text: How would you rate the professionalism of the installation team?

questions.question_text: Have you contacted customer support for any issues after installation?
questions.client_notes: Binary response for simplicity. Route to Q5 if 'Yes' is selected.

script.question_text: Have you contacted customer support for any issues after installation?

questions.question_text: How satisfied were you with the resolution provided by customer support?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale. Skip logic ensures only relevant respondents answer.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button (single-choice). Apply skip logic from Q4.

script.question_text: How satisfied were you with the resolution provided by customer support?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the EV home charging station installation service?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture qualitative feedback. Limit response length to 500 characters.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: open text. Add character limit validation.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the EV home charging station installation service?
